士.definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old); scholar (old); bachelor; honorific; soldier; noncommissioned officer; specialist worker

士官.definition: warrant officer; petty officer; noncommissioned officer (NCO); Japanese military officer

士族.definition: land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝[Wei4 Jin4 Nan2 Bei3 Chao2]

士林.definition: Shilin or Shihlin District of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 Shi4], Taiwan

士林區.definition: Shilin or Shihlin District of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 Shi4], Taiwan

士為知己者死，女為悅己者容.pinyin: shi4 wei4 zhi1 ji3 zhe3 si3 , nu:3 wei4 yue4 ji3 zhe3 rong2
士為知己者死，女為悅己者容.definition: a true gentleman will sacrifice his life for a friend who understands him, as a woman makes herself beautiful for her sweetheart

士農工商.definition: (idiom) "the four classes" of ancient China, i.e. scholars, farmers, artisans, and merchants
